DOCUMENT.CASUALTIES: Three of a family among four killed
DOCUMENT.PLACE: Sumaithangi in Vellore district of Tamil Nadu
DOCUMENT.CASUALTIES: deceased have been identified as Ilamparuthi, 35, of Settithanagal, his wife Saraswathi, 27, son Dhanush, 9
DOCUMENT.REASON: two-wheeler, lost control of the vehicle.
DOCUMENT.CASUALTIES: All of them suffered severe injuries and died
